content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
- Small electric poles at positions (-15.5, 19.5), (-15.5, 18.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(-18.0, -49.0) and a furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0)

### Iron plate factory at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position(5.0, -73.0)

### Lab at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position(-21.5, 25.5)

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)

### Pipe network
Consists of the following entities:
- Pipe groups at positions (-11.5, 20.5) and (-4.5, 21.5)

### Electricity network
Consists of the following entities:
- Electricity group at position(229346), with small electric poles at positions (-17.5, 26.5), (-16.5, 26.5), (-21.5, 22.5), (-23.5, 23.5), (-20.5, 23.5), (-21.5, 23.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to electric pole attributes
- Ensure that you are accessing valid attributes of entities. In this case, the 'ElectricityGroup' does not have an 'energy' attribute. Verify the entity's documentation for available attributes.

### Errors when trying to access entities at specific positions
- Make sure the entity you are trying to access exists at the specified position. In this case, the lab entity was not found at position (-21.5, 25.5). Double-check the position and ensure the entity is placed correctly before attempting to access it.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. This includes checking for existing entities in the desired location.
